CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The absorption maxima ( λ max ) of the film are located at 403 and 589 nm.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| film |

The entities in the paragraph are:

* "film"

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| film |

The entities in the paragraph that do not clearly refer to "Material Name" are:

* "absorption maxima" (this refers to a property of the material, rather than the material name itself)
* "let's think step by step" (this is a sentence that does not refer to any material name)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The absorption maxima ( λ max ) of the film are located at 403 and 589 nm.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| λ max |

In this case, "λ max" is the only valid entity in the paragraph, as it is a property name that refers to the absorption maxima of the film.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| λ max |

The entity "λ max" refers to the absorption maximum of the film, which is a material property.
